Text:
This week will be quite a milestone with the exit of Ronn Moss on the 14th ... he's going to be missed by many of his fans and it signals a close to the old days of the "Core Four"!
MsFenmore, thank you for bringing us B&B history! 
Cheers from Down Under ;-)
